entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:22 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -14.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 02:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

Temperature: -14.3°C

Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 64 %

Dewpoint: -19.7°C

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
